titles.title: Drug-Free Schools and Communities Act Amendments of 1993
To amend the Drug-Free Schools and Communities Act of 1986 to provide for the continuation of the programs of such Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: 11/4/1993--Introduced. Drug-Free Schools and Communities Act Amendments of 1993 - Amends the Drug-Free Schools and Communities Act of 1986 to extend the authorization of appropriations for programs under such Act, including training of teachers, counselors, and school personnel, and emergency grants.
